title: Sausage bake with gnocchi
directions: Toss together the peppers, gnocchi, olive oil and a generous amount of salt and pepper on a large baking tray.
Place the sausages on the tray. Roast for 25 minutes, or until the sausages and gnocchi are golden-brown and the peppers are soft and have started to brown around the edges. Serve.
ingredients: 1 red pepper, deseeded and cut into chunks
1 yellow pepper, deseeded and cut into chunks
1 orange pepper, deseeded and cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
